snippet.title: V is for Vortex - Available Now
snippet.description:
V is for Vortex is my new iPhone game inspired by the game Portal by Valve. V is a simple side scroller puzzle game, that you can quickly pick up and play on your iPhone or iPod Touch. It's due in early december, 2009 in the iTunes App Store.

For more information, visit: http://howihatethenight.com/games/v-is-for-vortex/

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/v-is-for-vortex/id336604785?mt=8
